posts.post_title: WTB or Trade Sweet Caporal 649 Overprints
posts.post_content:
EDIT :  Found what I needed. Thanks.

I'm looking for a few cards in PSA 4 grade. I have a few SGC's but trying to avoid crossing them over if I can. Here's what I need and what I have. Make me some offers. Not interested in selling the cards I have. Either PM me or email me at [url]d2ad2a@aol.com[/url]

Thanks, Ron

Looking for PSA 4 Factory 649's Only.

Billy Gilbert
Nap Lajoie – Throwing
Tubby Spencer
Bob Ewing (I have an SGC 50 to trade)
Tom Jones (I have an PSA 3 to trade)
Rube Manning – Batting (I have an BVG 4 to trade)
Charlie O’Leary – Portrait (I have an SGC 50 to trade)
Mike Powers (I have an SGC 50 to trade)
Heinie Wagner – Bat On Left Shoulder (I have an SGC 50 to trade)
